title: Cody Simpson's mum Angie shares cringeworthy response to son's X-rated photo with Miley Cyrus
text:
They left fans stunned after sharing an X-rated photo together, just weeks after confirming their romance.

And now Cody Simpson's mum Angie has reacted to the sultry snap, which saw her son's new girlfriend Miley Cyrus seductively running her hand down his underwear.

The mother-of-three bizarrely posted the sexy photo on her own Instagram story, where she labelled the pair as 'cheeky buggers'.

Suggestive: Cody Simpson (left) shared a racy selfie with Miley's (right) hand running down his pants - and his mum has awkwardly reacted

Letting them know she had seen the image, she then awkwardly tagged the pair in the post.

Angie has already given her seal of approval to the pair's surprise romance, following 26-year-old Miley's split from Liam Hemsworth earlier in the year.

On her Instagram page, Angie shared a pictured of the new couple which she captioned: 'Puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy.'

Seal of approval: Cody Simpson's mum Angie says the pair's new romance 'lights up my heart'

She added: 'Hearing your laughs and seeing the smiles on your faces lights up my heart. #happyforyouguys #beautifullsouls'.

Responding under the post, Miley's mum Tish added: 'Puts a smile on my face too @angiemsimpson love you my sweet friend'.

The images come shortly after Miley's relationship with her longtime singer-actor pal, 22, recently became romantic.

Having a laugh: Miley's mum Trish and his mum Angie publicly commented on the pair's blossoming romance

Young love: The genetically blessed duo have shared an abundance of loved-up snaps on social media ever since confirming their relationship earlier this month

Cody's manager told People in a statement that the two are 'both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together'.

'Seems pretty ideal to me,' he continued.

A source also told the publication that it's 'safe to say' the relationship is official.

The pair were spotted on a breakfast date earlier this month - not long after Cyrus parted ways with influencer Kaitlynn Carter, following her separation from Liam.

Ever since, the new couple have been spending time posting loved-up selfies on social media chronicling their new-found relationship.
description: Cody Simpson's mum Angie has reacted to her son's recent X-rated snap with new girlfriend Miley Cyrus, which saw her seductively running her hand down his underwear.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
